languages.text: "Не граничащий — это ересь в чистом виде, но смущает меня другое. Смущает, что умалишенный смог их издать".
"Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."
languages.original_text: "Не граничащий — это ересь в чистом виде, но смущает меня другое. Смущает, что умалишенный смог их издать".

traits.locale_text: "Not bordering; they are heresy writ large, but that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."
"Not bordering; they are heresy writ large, but that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."
"Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."
"Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."
"Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."
"Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

languages.text: "Grenzt? Nein, das ist glasklare Ketzerei. Doch das ist es nicht, was mich besorgt. Mich besorgt, dass der Wahnsinnige sie erfolgreich veröffentlichen könnte."
languages.original_text: "Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

traits.locale_text: "Grenzt? Nein, das ist glasklare Ketzerei. Doch das ist es nicht, was mich besorgt. Mich besorgt, dass der Wahnsinnige sie erfolgreich veröffentlichen könnte."

languages.text: « Elle ne se contente pas de la friser, c'est de l'hérésie pure et simple. Mais ce qui me préoccupe davantage, c'est que cet aliéné ait réussi à les publier. »
languages.original_text: "Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

traits.locale_text: « Elle ne se contente pas de la friser, c'est de l'hérésie pure et simple. Mais ce qui me préoccupe davantage, c'est que cet aliéné ait réussi à les publier. »

languages.text: 「異端すれすれ、というレベルではありません。これは明白な異端です。ですが私を悩ませているのはそのことではありません。悩ましいのは、その狂人が本を出版することに成功したという事実です」
languages.original_text: "Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

traits.locale_text: 「異端すれすれ、というレベルではありません。これは明白な異端です。ですが私を悩ませているのはそのことではありません。悩ましいのは、その狂人が本を出版することに成功したという事実です」

languages.text: «No es que raye en la herejía, constituyen herejía evidente. Lo que me preocupa, sin embargo, es que se le haya permitido publicarla abiertamente».
languages.original_text: "Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

traits.locale_text: «No es que raye en la herejía, constituyen herejía evidente. Lo que me preocupa, sin embargo, es que se le haya permitido publicarla abiertamente».

languages.text: “不是‘几乎’，那就是不折不扣的异端邪说。不过，让我感到困扰的问题不是这个，而是那个疯子的书居然真的出版了。”
languages.original_text: "Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

traits.locale_text: “不是‘几乎’，那就是不折不扣的异端邪说。不过，让我感到困扰的问题不是这个，而是那个疯子的书居然真的出版了。”

languages.text: "Gezmek ne kelime, düpedüz kâfirlik. Beni rahatsız eden o değil. Asıl o delinin o zırvaları basabilmiş olması kanıma dokunuyor."
languages.original_text: "Not bordering — they are heresy writ large. But that is not what troubles me. What troubles me is that the madman succeeded in publishing them."

traits.locale_text: "Gezmek ne kelime, düpedüz kâfirlik. Beni rahatsız eden o değil. Asıl o delinin o zırvaları basabilmiş olması kanıma dokunuyor."
